sessions.name: Morning session Apple Computer
sessions.abstract: In this session you will lean the basics of using macs and iphones. A free wifi is provided

sessions.name: Afternoon session Microsoft
sessions.abstract: In this session Bill Gates will take you through the advantage of using Windows

sessions.name: Evening session Google
sessions.abstract: You will learn an advanced techniques of using google search for your research

sessions.name: Introductory session with Amazon
sessions.abstract: In this course you will learn the backend functioning behind the most popular online store on the planet.
